name: ExplosiveDetector ( MineSweeper )
description: 'Inspired' by the classic game MineSweeper, ExplosiveDetector is a single-player puzzle game. The objective of the game is to clear a square 20 x 20 board containing 50 hidden "mines" or bombs without detonating any of them, with help from clues about the number of neighboring mines in each field and the player's placement of 'flags', which prevent the player from detonating marked fields.
